content: Jet lag's got me wired, so I'm turning it into a treasure hunt for the perfect event spot. NYC, you're full of surprises.
raw_content: Just got back to NYC and guess what? My jet lag is now a tech-themed social event planner. 🗽✨ Tried setting up the event at my usual spot but surprise, it's under renovation! So, I'm scouting new venues, embracing the chaos. #NYCLife #TechEventPlanning
